column1: This is a list of cities and towns in Uganda: The population data are for 2014
column2: except where otherwise indicated. The references from which the estimated populations are sourced are listed in each article for the cities and towns where the population estimates are given.

column1: The following population numbers are from the August 2014 national census
column2: as documented in the final report of November 2016
column3: by the Uganda Bureau of Statistics (UBOS).

column2: the Cabinet of Uganda approved the creation  of 15 cities
column4: over the course of the next one to three years
column5: as illustrated in the table below. The 7 of the 15 cities started operations on 1 July 2020 as approved by the Parliament of Uganda in an effort to decongest the capital
